name: sass2stylus
author: Jake Buob, Cory Simmons / MojoTech, Andrey Popp

scripts.watch: npm run js:copy && npm run css:watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run js:copy && npm run css:build
scripts.css:copy: cp front_end/assets/css/codemirror.css front_end/public/css && cp -r front_end/fonts front_end/public
scripts.css:watch: npm run css:copy && stylus -w front_end/assets/css/master.styl -o front_end/public/css/master.css
scripts.css:build: npm run css:copy && stylus front_end/assets/css/master.styl -o front_end/public/css/master.css
